item.title: ESMA review of national supervisory authorities'​ positions on Brexit relocation of investment funds
item.description: – Note: This post is a personal opinion/analysis and cannot be considered legal advice. Feel free to reach out if you wish to discuss further or require advice for your specific situation! – In an assessment of the Brexit relocation processes (available on the website of ESMA), ESMA last December made some interesting observations on how different national authorities handle firms’ relocation to the EU in the context of the UK’s withdrawal from the EU.
